title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat or embedding endpoints.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-web/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-like) with multi-model chats, file uploads, RAG, user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embeddings, list/pull models.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama API; chat, generate, pull, delete models.

title: ollama-cli (go-llama)
summary: Unofficial Go CLI wrapper around Ollama REST API with shell completions.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client for Ollama with strongly-typed models and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker image and compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm) inference.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama REST API with Tokio/async and streaming support.

title: ollama-node
summary: Zero-dependency Node.js wrapper for Ollama REST API (unofficial).

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Simple RAG chatbot using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB in 100 lines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that proxies Slack messages to Ollama and streams replies.

title: ollama-rust-embeddings
summary: Rust example repo showing how to generate embeddings with Ollama and compare vectors.

title: ollama-powershell
summary: PowerShell module wrapping Ollama REST API for Windows admins.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs ready for Ollama.
